name: smart-tourist-safety
description: Smart Tourist Safety Monitoring & Incident Response System

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter backend dev" "pnpm --filter web-dashboard dev" "pnpm --filter rag-service dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter web-dashboard build
scripts.db:migrate: cd supabase && npx supabase db push
scripts.db:seed: cd supabase && npx supabase db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd supabase && npx supabase db reset

author: Smart Tourist Safety Team
